Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Documentary papyrus
Description: Documentary papyrus. The tone initially employed ("to Pankrates (titles) on behalf of (x) greetings") reminds us of a petition of the "hypomnema" type, though the contents and the motivations for it being sent remain unknown to us.
